QuestData.Title: Sol Sisters
QuestData.Description: When I was still a guard in Skyreach, I was tasked with protecting the sisters Veoryx and Krashyx.$B$BThey were prodigies. At an age when most sun acolytes could barely read, the sisters conjured familiars of pure sunlight to illuminate their textbooks in the small hours.$B$BNow they unravel the secrets of Apexis technology, and their excavation has just breached two ancient chambers.$B$BEnter those chambers and cut down the sisters before they reap the terrible rewards of their discovery.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Sol-Shaper Veoryx and Sol-Shaper Krashyx.
QuestData.RewardText: <The core of this slumbering construct begins to hum softly.>
